name: StoryStarterbyselfStarterVOICEEDUCATION
0:
”Alexa, open Story Starter”
”Alexa, start Story Starter”
”Alexa, launch Story Starter”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: story starter
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Help your child become a self starter! Just teach them to say, "Alexa, open Story Starter" then say "Student," and Alexa will give them a daily writing prompt. Educational exercises initiated by students can help them become independent learners, while at the same time, developing confidence in their ability to finish assignments. 

After your child writes their response to the writing prompt, have them give it to you, and at your own leisure say, "Alexa, open Story Starter." Choose the "Teacher" option, and Alexa will read the teacher's guide for the daily writing prompt so you can review your student's work. 

If you have a pre-writer, have them dictate their answer to you, and use some or all of what you wrote down as an opportunity for them to do copy work. Dictation and copy work exercises will build reading, writing, and grammar skills.

This is the first Skill by selfStarter: VOICE EDUCATION. Go to https://selfstarter.io for more info about how to use this Skill, and for tips on how you can help your child become a self starter!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
